reviewText: An excellent history of the battle featuring first-person interviews with some of the survivors of the battle. An excellent companion for Eastwood's Epic.
Should be required viewing in school.  We tend to forget what World War II was really llike.
I am in to history of world war 11 . I am amazed at what our military can do. God bless them all. they deserve everyone's respect. Great product, the seller packed it great.
A must see for all to understand the great sacrifices of America's Greatest Generation.
Brought back a  lot of memories, some good and some bad.
Very well done from start to finish.
very well done. will look toward this video to remember father in law.  Slice of history we will look back on.
I left wanting more from this film, and give it "4" stars, but just OK and won't go any higher than that!

I just watched this downloaded to my computer and I'm going to buy it.  My Dad is on it a couple times which makes it a keep sake for the family.  He is shown on the cover also -- second from the left with thumbs in pockets.  It is awesome hearing the men who were there narate.  What these men sacrificed for our freedom must never be forgotten.  My Dad has been gone for 9 years now but we will never forget.
Love the video---an account of the battle and conditions on the island in the words of those who fought

I am absolutely in awe of the stories and real live footage straight from the veterans at Iwo Jima. WWII has affected each and every one of us in some way, whether we know it or not. And this DVD tells the stories straight from the Veterans themselves. Iwo Jima: 50 Years of Memories is a priceless historical video that should be watched by all ages for preservation of history. This DVD will increase anyone's perception of history and appreciation for the sacrifices these veterans have made for us.
Oral history is an integral part of passing on history. Through the Veteran's own words I have gained a greater appreciation and understanding of the events that took place on Iwo Jima. Many historians spend their whole life's work interviewing numerous veterans to gain a better understanding of different battles and wars. However, through this DVD I now own a piece of history! This DVD captures and preserves history. The result is a fuller appreciation and understanding of the events and experiences that constitute the history and heritage of our great nation. I absolutely recommend that each and every person buy this DVD.
